# Notes on ricing
* remove autogenerated comments
* set up monitors
    - monitor = [DP-1], 2560x1440@144,1
* wallpaper
    * hyprpaper.conf
        * wallpaper
            * `{`
            `monitor = DP-1`
            `path = /home/drix/Pictures/Wallpapers/dmytro-yarish-yNTrQwvYjno-unsplash.jpg`
            `fit_mode = cover`
        }`
    - autorun at start
        `exec-once = hyprpaper`
* waybar
    - config.jsonc & style.css
    - script to reload waybar:
    ---
        #!/bin/bash 
        killall -9 waybar
        waybar &
        chmod +x launch.sh - makes executible 
        launch.sh
